column1: Hello everybody! I updated the overview sheet with a guide on unfinished items/guidelines before asking me to P/C. Please read that before messaging me!

column13: Scroll right for some WA mathemagic!

column10: Even at listed prices, mastery books can often be very slow to sell, with the main exceptions being MW and Gen. Book prices are extremely volatile, except MW/Gen/HW10

column13: Why would you click this cell? It's empty!

column6: Far too rare to price. The only source is White Lady during Halloween

column4: Occasionally 30%s are sold as dummy scrolls for 100-300k/ea. Generally you need bulk for them to sell
